### Welcome to my portfolio page.
![](https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/9277060?v=3&s=460)
***

I'm Md.Arafat Islam Leon, from Bangladesh. I'm working with web template development projects. Recently I'm employed to a company where I develop web templates using Joomla CMS. I can customize any components of joomla according to designs. I know how to create modules, plugins in Joomla. 

I graduated from Microbiology. Although I'm from life science background, my passion is working with programming languages. I've been learning since 2013 and now trying to keep myself up to date with trendy skills and knowledge that I must maintain regarding my career.

Below are the list of projects I can execute professionally:

## Blogging and writing:

I started my freelancing career with writing projects. Since 2010 I've been writing in various web content projects. I'm able to make unique content using proper grammar. I can write documentation also.

## Client supports:

In my present company I support clients online when they get issues using our company products.
